meanings.sent1: His aggressiveness on the field made him a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent2: Her aggressiveness in negotiations often led to successful deals.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's aggressiveness towards the mailman was both amusing and concerning.
meanings.sent4: The aggressiveness of the storm was evident in the howling winds and crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The aggressiveness of the lioness protecting her cubs was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The tendency to behave in an attacking or confrontational manner.
meanings.sent1: The team's aggressiveness in the game intimidated their opponents.
meanings.sent2: His aggressiveness in arguments often caused unnecessary conflicts.
meanings.sent3: The aggressiveness of the squirrel trying to steal birdseed was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The aggressiveness of the stock market can be compared to a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The aggressiveness of the waves crashing against the shore was both powerful and mesmerizing.
